item.title: Refactoring Old Works
item.description: I’d managed to produce some fairly original essays on my last blog and I’ll soon be incorporating them into posts here. I had a habit of writing in streams in the main blog itself and there is a lot of insight stored in the chronology of some such logs. The old blog is archived in the repository here and I could benefit from repurposing old works into the present setup.
